entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
